page.title: 10TELEVISION
page.content:
First Amateur Television Station in Ireland to commemorate the 150th Anniversary of Sir Robert Hart
Another commemoration of Sir Robert Hart took place with an ATV demonstration between Rathvarna Teachers centre, Pond Park, Lisburn and Drumbo Primary School on Tuesday 26th November 1985. Keith Burnside of UTV presented the ATV programme from Drumbo P.S. and Stanley Bell, Principal of Ravarnette rimary School presented the programme from Rathvarna. Special Guest was Mary Peters and pupils from Beechlawn, Pond Park P.S., Killowen PS, Finaghy PS, Dollingstown PS, Drumbo PS, and Ravarnette PS. took part.It was opened by Walter Lillburn, Mayor of Lisburn.
